description: Disassociates a knowledge base from an agent.

parameters.name: agentId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the agent from which to disassociate the knowledge base.

parameters.name: agentVersion
parameters.description: The version of the agent from which to disassociate the knowledge base.

parameters.name: knowledgeBaseId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the knowledge base to disassociate.
